titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Child Protection Plan - Description

body.p: A Child Protection Plan Â is a CARE PLAN .

div.p: assess the likelihood of the child suffering harm and look at ways that the child can be protected;
decide upon short and long term aims to reduce the likelihood of harm to the child and to protect the child's welfare;
clarify people's responsibilities and actions to be taken; and
outline ways of monitoring and evaluating progress.
